CustomField.formula: IF ((Account.Customer_Type_f__c = 'Existing' || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Type__c, 'Domestic Strategic Account') || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Type__c, 'Global Strategic Account') || Account.Count_of_Active_Opps__c > 0 || Account.Competitor__c = TRUE || Account.Supplier__c = TRUE || Account.Partner__c = TRUE ) ,true, false )
CustomField.label: Open Doors DNC
